item.title: Franz Ferdinand - Take Me Out

작곡: Sung by / 작사: Alex Kaprano, Bob Hardy, Nicholas McCarthy, Paul Thomson
KY: 61507 / KY: 21252

So if
you’re lonely
You know I’m here
waiting for you

a cross hair

from you

leave here
